sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
import { CardContainer, Header, Title, CampaingId, Info,
  Footer, FunilStep, LastFunilStep, TitleStep, ContentStep,
  TextContent, ContentNumber, StepPercent, FooterInfo, FooterNumber, FooterText } from './styles'
import { CampaingSummaryModel } from '../../../models/campaing-summary'
import { loadCampaingSummary } from '../../../services'
import { User } from '../../../models/user'
import Loading from '../../Loading'

interface Props {
  id: number
  name: string
  user?: User[]
}

const SummaryCard = ({ id, name, user }: Props) => {
  const [campaingSummary, setCampaingSummary] = useState<CampaingSummaryModel>()

  useEffect(() => {
    if(user) {
      loadCampaingSummary(id, user[0].accessToken)
      .then(resp => {
        setCampaingSummary(resp.data.campaing)
        console.log(resp)
      })
      .catch(error => {
        console.log(error)
      })
    }
  }, [id, user])

  return (
    <CardContainer>
      <Header>
        <Title>{name}</Title>
        <CampaingId>id campanha: {id}</CampaingId>
      </Header>
      
      {campaingSummary? (
        <>
          <Info>
            <FunilStep>
              <TitleStep>Página de Noticias</TitleStep>
              
              <ContentStep>
                <ContentNumber>{campaingSummary.totalClicks}</ContentNumber>
                <TextContent>Pessoas acessaram a página</TextContent>
            </ContentStep>
            </FunilStep>

            <FunilStep>
              <TitleStep>Página de Compra</TitleStep>
              
              <ContentStep>
                <ContentNumber>{campaingSummary.totalProductPage}</ContentNumber>
                <TextContent>Pessoas acessaram a página</TextContent>
                <StepPercent>{JSON.stringify(campaingSummary.totalProductPage/campaingSummary.totalClicks*100).substring(0,4)}%</StepPercent>
                <TextContent>Da página anterior</TextContent>
              </ContentStep>
            </FunilStep>

            <FunilStep>
              <TitleStep>Checkout</TitleStep>
            
              <ContentStep>
                <ContentNumber>{campaingSummary.totalCheckoutPage}</ContentNumber>
                <TextContent>Pessoas acessaram a página</TextContent>
                <StepPercent>{campaingSummary.totalProductPage? JSON.stringify(campaingSummary.totalCheckoutPage/campaingSummary.totalProductPage*100).substring(0,4): 0}%</StepPercent>
                <TextContent>Da página anterior</TextContent>
              </ContentStep>
            </FunilStep>

            <LastFunilStep>
              <TitleStep>Pagos</TitleStep>

              <ContentStep>
                <ContentNumber>{campaingSummary.totalPaidClicks}</ContentNumber>
                <TextContent>Pessoas acessaram a página</TextContent>
                <StepPercent>{campaingSummary.totalCheckoutPage? JSON.stringify(campaingSummary.totalPaidClicks/campaingSummary.totalCheckoutPage*100).substring(0,4) : 0}%</StepPercent>
                <TextContent>Da página anterior</TextContent>
            </ContentStep>
            </LastFunilStep>
          </Info>

          <Footer>
            <FooterInfo style={{backgroundColor: '#3f3f3f'}}>
              <FooterText>Taxa de conversão</FooterText>
              <FooterNumber>{JSON.stringify(campaingSummary.totalPaidClicks/campaingSummary.totalClicks*100).substring(0,5)}%</FooterNumber>
            </FooterInfo>

            <FooterInfo>
              <FooterText>Faturamento</FooterText>
              <FooterNumber>R$ 10.00</FooterNumber>
            </FooterInfo>
          </Footer>
        </>
      ) : (
        <Loading />
      )}
    </CardContainer>
  )
}

export default SummaryCard
